derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in sense 2): perhaps of Low German origin

encyclopedia.content: 郑国锋（1991年9月9日），华语乐坛新人气歌手。17岁开始创作，两年迅速成长为国内最具潜力创作型歌手之一。其一经发布新歌曲，迅速登上各大主流媒体首页。2011年新专辑主打歌《陪我去宇宙》发布以来点击量，下载量成为最受好评歌曲之一，同时众多翻唱此歌网友的热情证实了这首歌必将成为新经典励志歌曲。该专辑发行之后让更多人认识了内地新音乐的力量。2012年发布新专辑《角落里的阳光》成功蜕变，3首MV尽走唯美感人路线。专辑发布获得各大媒体焦点推荐。之后因为个人原因，现在已经退出所属公司。现为独立音乐人。

entry.def: A clown is a performer in a circus who wears funny clothes and bright make-up, and does silly things in order to make people laugh.

entry.tran: 扮小丑，装傻，作蠢相（逗人发笑）
entry.def: If you clown, you do silly things in order to make people laugh.

example.ex: Bruno clowned and won affection everywhere.
example.tran: 布鲁诺很会耍活宝，到哪儿都受到大家的喜爱。

entry.tran: 爱开玩笑的人;诙谐的人;活宝
entry.def: If you say that someone is a clown, you mean that they say funny things or do silly things to amuse people.

example.ex: He was laughing, the clown of the twosome.
example.tran: 他在笑，二人搭档中逗人乐的那个。

entry.def: If you describe someone as a clown, you disapprove of them and have no respect for them.

example.ex: I still think I could do a better job than those clowns in Washington.
example.tran: 我还是认为自己会比华盛顿的那些蠢货干得好。

means.word_mean: 2. a person who amuses others by ridiculous behavior
1. act as or like a clown

auth_sentence.content: This clown was legally arrested for brandishing a shotgun.
auth_sentence.res_content: This clown was legally arrested for brandishing a shotgun.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This clown was legally arrested for brandishing a shotgun.

auth_sentence.content: I see clown fish being gleefully tickled by anemones.
auth_sentence.res_content: I see clown fish being gleefully tickled by anemones.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I see clown fish being gleefully tickled by anemones.

auth_sentence.content: I will continue to clown around, whatever happens.
auth_sentence.res_content: I will continue to clown around, whatever happens.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I will continue to clown around, whatever happens.

sentences.en: I used to like the clowns best at the circus.
sentences.cn: 我以前在马戏里最爱看小丑。

sentences.en: The boy plays the clown to get attention.
sentences.cn: 那男孩作出滑稽的动作以便引人注意。

jushi.english: The moment the clown appeared on stage,the audience folded up.
jushi.chinese: 小丑一出现在舞台上，观众们个个笑得前俯后仰。

jushi.english: Each clown capped the last joke of the other.
jushi.chinese: 丑角的笑话一个比一个好。

jushi.english: Good clown know how to play the ape.
jushi.chinese: 好的小丑知道如何模仿。
